titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increase in tax on commercial aviation fuel which is scheduled to take effect on October 1, 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/9/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the increase in tax on fuel used in commercial aviation scheduled to take effect after September 30, 1995.
